questions.question: Which process is an example of a physical change?
Which process is an example of a physical change?
Which process is an example of a physical change?

choices.answer: Cutting carrots into pieces and mixed in a salad
A peanut butter and jelly sandwich being digested
Sodium metal and water combining to for a compound and gas
Sodium metal and chlorine gas combined to form table salt

questions.question: Which process is an example of a physical change?

choices.answer: Water turns to steam when boiled
Carbon combines with oxygen to form carbon dioxide gas
Water breaks down into hydrogen oxygen gases over time
Limestone breaks down into lime and carbon dioxide if heated

questions.question: Which process is an example of a physical change?
Pablo notices that ice cream melts when left out at room temperature. What is Pablo observing?

choices.answer: The formation of a new substance

questions.question: Marco tears a piece of notebook paper into smaller pieces, as shown below. This is a ____?
Gallium is a metal. If you hold a solid piece in your hand, it will melt. This is a _____.
Which type of change does the diagram below show?
Which process is an example of a chemical change?

choices.answer: A metal railing rusting in damp weather
Alcohol evaporating from a cotton swab
Steam rising from a boiling pot of soup
A piece of wood shrinking as it dries out

questions.question: Which process is a sign of a chemical change?

choices.answer: A rotting potato gives off a bad smell
A melting block of ice leaves a large puddle
A cloud quickly changes shape when blown by wind
A plaster statue breaks when it falls onto the floor

questions.question: Which process represents a chemical change?

choices.answer: A lake freezes over into ice
Vinegar bubbles when baking soda is added
A metal bar is rolled into a flat sheet
Sand, water, and salt combine to form a mixture

questions.question: Which process is an example of a chemical change?

choices.answer: Bath water cooling while you take a bath
A piece of metal being heated until it expands
A glass window breaking when hit with a baseball

questions.question: Sean's bike begins to rust in the winter.What tells Sean that a chemical change is happening?

choices.answer: The metal is beginning to rust
The bicycle was outside all winter

questions.question: After10mins Rita's toast is black on both sides.What caused the chemical reaction to go too far
Which process is an example of a chemical change?
Gordon adds a solid and a liquid together and produces a gas. Which process must have occurred?
Burning wood into ash is an example of which kind of change?
Which types of changes observe the law of conservation of mass?
Paper is burned & the mass of the ash is less than the mass of the original paper.Which is true

choices.answer: The ash has less volume than the paper
Some of the matter is destroyed during the reaction
The mass of the ash cannot be accurately determined
Some of the products of the reaction were given off as a gas
